00012 
00013 #define GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, multiLine) \
00014    TextField * variable; \
00015    if ((variable = new TextField) == NULL) \
00016       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00017    if (area != NULL) \
00018       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00019    if (groupField != NULL) \
00020       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
00021    variable->setMultiLine(multiLine);
00022 
00023 #define GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py, multiLine) \
00024    GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, multiLine) \
00025    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00026 
00027 #define GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height, multiLine) \
00028    GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, multiLine) \
00029    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00030       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00031 
00032 #define GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD_PS(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, multiLine) \
00033    GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, multiLine) \
00034    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00035    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00036       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00037 
00038 #define GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD_M(variable, area, groupField, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, multiLine) \
00039    GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, multiLine) \
00040    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00041    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00042 
00043 #define GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD_PM(variable, area, groupField, px, py, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, multiLine) \
00044    GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, multiLine) \
00045    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00046    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00047    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00048 
00049 #define GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD_SM(variable, area, groupField, width, height, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, multiLine) \
00050    GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, multiLine) \
00051    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00052    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00053       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00054 
00055 #define GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD_PSM(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, multiLine) \
00056    GLAZIERY_TEXTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, multiLine) \
00057    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00058    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00059    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00060       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
